item.title: Arms
item.description: Laws Arms act GA. Gun import Current laws (IFG-LE): 3 gun limit, gun club membership enables import of air guns, 17mm and lower airgun pellets don’t need license, license to be renewed every 3 years, approval category whimsical. Local manufacture: Munger. Air gun import rules IFG08IBR Ranges Eminent Rifle Shooting Sports Training Academy

item.title: Flight
item.description: Microlight Costs : 2008 here. Jakkur parking Rs 200 per day 20,00,000 for own microlight. 3-axis, “X-air Microlights” . 20 lac INR. Training BLR Aerosports here. Rides AN Jakkur here. MFl Jakkur here. Viking Jakkur here. They do Aeromodelling too. Hang gliding License requirements here. Equipment Spirit 16 – Rs. 1,96,900 + lorry packing 5000. Ace Blr.

item.title: Skiing
item.description: Gulmarg 3 lifts, 30 km. rental rates here. Kullu - manAli http://skiinginmanali.com/ 1 lift Auli http://www.auliskiing.in/ski-aim.html Sikkim Phuni Valley in Lachung-Sikkim Yumthang Valley, Sikkim Tawang
